titleStmt.title: A true account of the dying uuords of Ockanickon, an Indian king, spoken to Jahkursoe, his brother's son, whom he appointed king after him.
titleStmt.author: Ockanikon, d. 1682?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Benjamin Clark, bookseller, in George-Yard in Lombard-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
